You can activate free spins at the moment when 3 or more Scatters appear on the playing field. As a result, you can take from 10 to 20 free spins. The more scatters, the more free spins you get.

blocks.text: Big Bass Bonanza Bonus

Big Bass Bonanza is very popular among gamblers. This is a popular slot from the Pragmatic Play studio on the theme of fish and fishing. Today, there is a whole series of games about fishing. Each slot has different graphics, game elements, additional features and bonus functions.

Playing Big Bass Bonanza, you can get a double advantage. Firstly, the game has several bonus functions at once. Secondly, many casinos give out generous gifts and allow you to take part in promotions.
In this review, you will find out what bonuses you can get from online casinos when playing Big Bass Bonanza, as well as what in-game bonus functions this popular fishing project hides.
In-Game Bonuses Big Bass Bonanza
Most traditional slots only allow you to spin the reels and get winnings due to combinations of symbols. But the Big Bass Bonanza game has some differences and important advantages.

There are several in-game bonus features implemented here. This is a great opportunity to increase your initial winnings, play bonus rounds, use multipliers, symbol substitution, and much more. It is important to note that the presented bonus features may not be present in all games of the Big Bass Bonanza series.
Free Spins
To activate this bonus, the player needs 3, 4, or 5 Scatter symbols to appear on the playing field. For this, he can get 10, 15, or 20 free spins.

When using free spins, another important symbol can appear on the reels - the Fisherman. He is able to collect all the money values from the fish symbols. Every 4 Fisherman symbols allow you to restart the round and get a new package of free spins. At the same time, a multiplier is activated, which can be x2, x3, and x10.
The Free Spins function is the main one in the Big Bass Bonanza game and is present in all slots of this series.
Dynamite

This is a random in-game feature that appears only in the free spins bonus round mode. If the Fisherman appears during the spins, but there are no money fish, he throws dynamite into the lake. Due to the explosion of dynamite, several regular symbols can turn into money.

The advantage of this bonus feature is that you have an increased chance of winning a big win, even if the previous spin did not give the desired result. Dynamite is considered an element of surprise and makes the gameplay even more unpredictable.
Bazooka

Another in-game bonus feature that is activated in the free spins round mode. If the Fisherman symbol appears on the screen, but the right fish did not fall on the reels, then he starts shooting from a bazooka. This feature allows you to replace all the current symbols with new ones.

Bazooka is a great chance to get a set of money fish symbols and increase the amount of winnings. Basically, the Bazooka bonus feature is available in the Big Bass Bonanza Megaways version and some other slots in the fishing series.
Hook

After spins, an animation with a Fisherman may appear on the screen. He will try to pull out symbols using a huge metal hook. The game mechanics allow the player to pull out the necessary fish symbols after he has already made a spin.
The Hook is a bonus feature with an element of surprise. The main task of the Hook is to compensate for previous unsuccessful spins and give the player more money, winning symbols.
Free Spins Re-Trigger

If you collect 4 Fisherman symbols during the free spins bonus round, the round will be re-activated and re-launched. That is, the player will be able to get 10 free spins again and take advantage of multipliers from x2 to x10.
With this bonus feature, you can extend the series of games with free spins. This is especially useful if you play Big Bass Bonanza with high volatility.
Money Symbols

In the Big Bass Bonanza game, the main symbols that bring the main money are fish. They can provide you with a win with a multiplier of up to x2000 of the bet size, depending on the version of the game.
When fish symbols appear, the Fisherman appears, who collects all the dropped values. This is the main way to win large amounts in the Big Bass Bonanza game in free spins mode.
Bonus Buy

Almost all versions of the Big Bass Bonanza game provide the ability to use the bonus buy function. You only need to pay a fixed amount to immediately go to the bonus round with free spins. In this case, there is no need to spin and wait for several Scatters to appear.
Such a bonus option allows you to quickly conduct gaming sessions with potentially high winnings.
Casino Bonuses for Big Bass Bonanza
Depending on which online casino you play Big Bass Bonanza in, you can get different types of bonuses and rewards.

items: Free spins. Most often, when registering, making the first deposit, casinos give new players a package of free spins. First, make sure that the rules of the promotion allow them to be used in Big Bass Bonanza;

Welcome bonus. The most common bonus for new players is a welcome reward. Usually it is 100-500% of the deposit and can be valid only for the first or first few replenishments of the game balance. You can spend the money you receive by playing Big Bass Bonanza. The money often comes with free spins;

Reload bonus. A popular type of reward. When making deposits, you can receive about 50% as a bonus. The money you receive can also be used to make spins in Big Bass Bonanza and not risk your own bankroll;

Cashback. Many casinos pay players a portion of the amount they lost during this period once a week. The cashback amount ranges from 2 to 30%. The funds can be credited to the main or bonus balance. They can be used to play Big Bass Bonanza;

Loyalty program and VIP club. Active players receive advanced features, additional privileges and personalized bonuses. Therefore, this is a great chance to pick up free spins, and play money for use in Big Bass Bonanza.

blocks.text: Before activating a casino bonus, you should carefully read the description and terms. Also consider the wagering requirements.
Big Bass Bonanza is a great game that combines exciting gameplay, intuitive controls and a variety of in-game features.
